data.title: DWR Awards $46M to Help Communities Improve Water Supply Reliability, Groundwater Recharge and Water Use Efficiency
data.excerpt: The Department of Water Resources (DWR) announced grant awards to nine projects in six counties through the Urban Community Drought Relief Grant program. The $46 million in financial assistance will provide critical support to implement drought relief projects that build long-term drought and climate resilience in communities across the state, and help advance efforts outlined in … Read more
